title: Wait, women lie?
author: VD
content_html: Over at Alpha Game, I have some thoughts on the feminist activist who has belatedly come to admit the possibility that not all women are perfectly devoted to the objective truth now that her son has been accused of rape. And Susan Walsh makes a case for enlightened self-interest.
content_text:
Over at Alpha Game, I have some thoughts on the feminist activist who has belatedly come
to admit the possibility
that not all women are perfectly devoted to the objective truth now that her son has been accused of rape.  And Susan Walsh makes
a case for enlightened self-interest
.
